description:
With their stretchy, softshell fleece front and seat, and breathable back of leg, these pants are that just right for those days you’re there as much for the views and company, as you are for the workout. Balancing warmth and weather protection, the Kikut pants excel on relaxed ski trips in nearly any conditions.

  • Polyester softshell fabric has a soft brushed inner that wicks away moisture while holding in heat, and a smooth outer that helps keep the elements at bay
  • Stretch material is a soft and stretchy polyester and spandex blend
  • BIONIC-FINISH® ECO fluorocarbon-free water and dirt repellent finish helps keep you clean and dry
  • Elasticised waist and internal drawcord for that perfect fit
  • Articulated knees let the pants moves with you
  • Structured cuffs sit nicely over the top of boots
  • Single zippered pocket keeps your keys secure
  • Subtle reflective details help keep you seen
  • Regular fit wears just like you hoped it would
name: B Daehlie Kikut Full Zip Pants - Men's
